entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Haldimand County
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 12:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: SW 36 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries or drizzle. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries or drizzle this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
